subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When his feet started going numb at the start of the fall semester and his legs did not quite feel right during a hockey practice in early November, the Colgate University senior defenseman Mike Campaner brushed it off. More problems with his back. He had dealt with it before.
